Package com.project.src.expense

Class ExpensesPage

java.lang.Object
com.project.src.expense.ExpensesPage
public class ExpensesPage extends Object
Represents the page for displaying and managing expenses.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Angelo Ripamonti invalid input: '&' Luca Avveduto

  • Constructor Details

    • ExpensesPage

      public ExpensesPage(processing.core.PApplet processing, controlP5.ControlP5 cp5, DBManager database) throws NullPointerException
      Constructs an ExpensesPage with the specified processing, ControlP5 instance, and database manager.
      Parameters:
      processing - the PApplet instance for Processing library functions. Must not be null.
      cp5 - the ControlP5 instance for GUI elements. Must not be null.
      database - the DBManager instance for database operations. Must not be null.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw()
      Draws the expenses page including the filtered and ordered list of expenses.

    • mouseWheel

      public void mouseWheel(processing.event.MouseEvent event)
      Handles mouse wheel events to scroll the content of the expenses page. This method adjusts the scroll position based on the amount of scrolling performed by the user. The scroll position is constrained to ensure it remains within valid bounds.
      Parameters:
      event - the mouse event containing the scroll amount

    • addCallback

      public void addCallback()
      Callback method to switch the view to the add expense menu. This method sets the on flag to false, which triggers the display of the add expense menu instead of the main expenses page.

    • getListToShow

      public ArrayList<ExpenseController> getListToShow()
      Returns a copy of the list of ExpenseController objects to be shown.
      Returns:
      a new ArrayList containing the ExpenseController objects to be shown

    • reorderCallback

      public void reorderCallback(Comparator c) throws NullPointerException
      Reorders the list of expenses based on the provided comparator. This method retrieves the list of expenses for the current account from the database, then sorts this list using the specified comparator. If the comparator is null, a NullPointerException will be thrown.
      Parameters:
      c - the comparator used to order the list of expenses. Must not be null
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the comparator c is null

    • changeListToShow

      public void changeListToShow(ArrayList<ExpenseController> listToShow)
      Changes the list of ExpenseController objects to be shown.
      Parameters:
      listToShow - the new list of ExpenseController objects

    • getAddButton

      public controlP5.Button getAddButton()
      Returns the button used to add new expenses.
      Returns:
      the button for adding new expenses

    • getAdx

      public AddExpense getAdx()
      Returns the instance of the AddExpense class used for managing the add expense menu.
      Returns:
      the AddExpense instance

    • setOn

      public void setOn(boolean v)
      Sets the flag indicating whether the main expenses page or the add expense menu is displayed.
      Parameters:
      v - true to show the main expenses page, false to show the add expense menu

    • getGraphic

      public controlP5.Button getGraphic()
      Returns the button used to access graphic settings.
      Returns:
      the button for graphic settings

    • getSettings

      public controlP5.Button getSettings()
      Returns the button used to access account settings.
      Returns:
      the button for account settings
